name: Forkify application
description: Forkify is a user-friendly cooking companion app that offers a vast database of recipes, meal planning tools, and a vibrant community for food enthusiasts. Discover, plan, and prepare delicious meals effortlessly with Forkify.

name: E-commerce website
description: Explore our sleek e-commerce platform for clothing, where style meets convenience. Discover trendsetting collections, shop with confidence, and enjoy a seamless shopping experience from the comfort of your home. Join our fashion community and elevate your wardrobe effortlessly.

name: Homes
description: The Homes application simplifies the search for houses across the United States with its user-friendly interface. Users can filter listings based on city. With features for saving favorites and scheduling viewings, Homes streamlines the process of finding the ideal home.

name: Pro Shop
description: Proshop is an innovative online platform dedicated to offering a curated selection of premium digital products, including smartphones, gaming consoles, accessories, and more. Built on cutting-edge technologies like Node.js, React.js, Express.js, and MongoDB, Proshop provides a seamless and secure shopping experience for tech enthusiasts worldwide.
